header.headline: Sell your works on the most comprehensive art marketplace

steps.description: Submit details about your work in a few steps
steps.title: Submit

steps.description: Receive offers from Artsy's partner network, privacy 100% guaranteed
steps.title: Select

steps.description: Get your work placed in an upcoming sale
steps.title: Sell

placement.headline: Artsy will connect you with our network of top tier partners

questions.headline: Have questions? We're here to help

sections.description: Artsy wants to make it easy and effective to [buy and sell](https://www.artsy.net/article/artsy-specialist-4-reasons-sell-collection-artsy) art. We partner with premier auction houses and other third parties to remove the stress from the selling process, and to give you access to the highest level of service.
Submissions are routed to our network of auction house and third party partners. Our growing list of partners includes many of the top auction houses and galleries across the globe.
sections.sub_headline: What happens once I submit a work?

sections.description: Artsy does not charge the user any fees. When we connect you with a partner, the partner will provide you an estimate of the fees they may charge you for their services.

sections.sub_headline: Want to learn more? Read our full FAQ or contact us.

top_sales.headline: We've been helping collectors get their works placed in top sales

upcoming_sales.headline: Have your work sold at one of our upcoming partner sales

items.answer: When collectors sell works of art, they generally do so through a gallery or auction house. The works are put in the care of - or consigned to - these establishments to be sold to potential buyers. The gallery or auction house receives a commission on each work sold.

items.question: What happens once I submit a work to Artsy Consignments?
